title: The Bachelorette: Angie Kent worried about Gogglebox reactions to her
text:
She rose to fame by making snarky comments about celebrities on Gogglebox, and now she's a fully-fledged TV star herself.

And on Thursday, The Bachelorette's Angie Kent revealed what she thinks about her former co-stars providing commentary on her journey to find love.

Speaking to the Mumbrella podcast, Angie said she was slightly worried about what the couch critics will say about her.

'Hopefully they're kind to me!' Angie Kent (pictured) has revealed what she thinks about her Gogglebox co-stars judging her as The Bachelorette

'They're my family and you always want to know what your family thinks,' Angie said.

'I've received so many beautiful messages from them saying they're so excited. Of course I want to watch it and hopefully they're kind to me!

'I know I've said a few things [about reality stars on Gogglebox]... You know, it's all tongue and cheek but it can get a little ruthless when it comes to dating shows!'

Nerves: Speaking to the Mumbrella podcast, Angie said she was slightly worried about what the couch critics will say about her. Pictured: Lee from Gogglebox

Reflecting: 'I know I've said a few things [about reality stars on Gogglebox]... You know, it's all tongue and cheek but it can get a little ruthless!' Angie said

During her years on Gogglebox, Angie and her roommate Yvie Jones would regularly make fun of Bachelorette and Bachelor contestants.

She once described men who apply for The Bachelorette as 'little fart sacks' who want to be famous.

The first Gogglebox reactions to Angie's season will air on Wednesday, and it remains to be seen how they address her involvement.

'Little fart sacks': During her years on Gogglebox, Angie and her roommate Yvie Jones (right) would regularly make fun of Bachelorette and Bachelor contestants

It's almost certain the cast will react to scenes involving Jess Glasgow, the Noosa councillor who was sent home on Thursday's episode.

Jess, who has faced calls to resign from his local government position, made several crude comments about Angie and even referred to her a 'b**ch'.

He has also been accused of making female crew members feel uncomfortable by awkwardly flirting with them.
description: She rose to fame by making snarky comments about celebrities on Gogglebox, and now she's a fully-fledged TV star herself.
authors: Shive Prema For Daily Mail Australia
